item.title: DATA100-lab6: Linear Regression
item.author: HHZZ
item.description: 1 2 3 # Initialize Otter import otter grader = otter.Notebook("lab06.ipynb") Lab 6: Linear Regression Objectives In this lab, you will review the details of linear regresison as described in Lectures 10 and 11. In particular: Matrix formulation and solution to Ordinary Least Squares sns.lmplot as a quick visual for simple linear regression scikit-learn, a real world data science tool that is more robust and flexible than analytical/scipy.optimize solutions You will also practice interpreting residual plots (vs.
